captions.text:
What the hell are we
supposed to do, you moron?

War's over, man.
Wormer dropped the big one.

Nothing is over
until we decide it is!

Was it over when the Germans
bombed Pearl Harbor?

- Forget it. He's rolling.
- And it ain't over now.

Who's with me?
Let's go! Come on!

What the fuck happened
to the Delta I used to know?

This could be the greatest
night of our lives...

but you're gonna let it
be the worst.

"Oh, we're afraid to go with you,
Bluto. We might get in trouble."

Well, just kiss my ass
from now on!

Not me!
I'm not gonna take this!

Now, we could fight 'em
with conventional weapons...

but that could take years
and cost millions of lives.
I think we have to go all out.

I think this situation
absolutely requires...

a really futile
and stupid gesture...
We're just the guys to do it.

- Let's do it.
- Let's do it!

title: Bluto's Big Speech - Animal House (9/10) Movie CLIP (1978) HD
